issues.description: The solution implementation declares two getters as private (getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents()), while the problem statement explicitly asks students to implement getters for each attribute. This creates a visibility mismatch: getters are expected to be public so that other classes/tests can access lecture fields. Having these two getters private in the solution contradicts the exercise specification and may confuse students about the intended API and access level for getters.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the getters public in the solution so they match the problem specification. Specifically, change getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents() to public. Ensure the template (when students implement the methods) and any reference solution use public getters for all attributes to avoid confusion about the intended API.
